title: Kamala Harris Concedes Election To Trump, Tells Supporters To "Fight On"
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris conceded the presidential election to Donald Trump after an acrimonious, turbulent and polarising campaign.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris conceded the presidential election to Donald Trump after an acrimonious, turbulent and polarising campaign.

title: vThe Trump Dynasty Soon To Be America's "First Family"
content: President-elect Donald Trump will return to the White House in January joined by his family, who played an outsized role in his first administration and on the campaign trail this year.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump will return to the White House in January joined by his family, who played an outsized role in his first administration and on the campaign trail this year.

title: Biden Congratulates Trump On Win, Invites Him To White House
content: President Joe Biden called Donald Trump to congratulate him on his victory Wednesday and invited his Republican successor to hold a meeting in the "near future," the White House said.
summary: President Joe Biden called Donald Trump to congratulate him on his victory Wednesday and invited his Republican successor to hold a meeting in the "near future," the White House said.

title: Trump, Kamala Harris Agree On Importance Of "Unifying Country": His Team
content: Donald Trump spoke with Kamala Harris by telephone Wednesday and agreed with his White House rival on the need to unify the nation after their contentious campaign, the president-elect's team said.
summary: Donald Trump spoke with Kamala Harris by telephone Wednesday and agreed with his White House rival on the need to unify the nation after their contentious campaign, the president-elect's team said.

title: Sundar Pichai To Nikki Haley, How Indian-Americans Reacted To Trump 2.0
content: Eminent Indian Americans on Wednesday welcomed the re-election of Donald Trump as the 47th president of the United States and assured to work with him on several issues, including that of the US-India relationship.
summary: Eminent Indian Americans on Wednesday welcomed the re-election of Donald Trump as the 47th president of the United States and assured to work with him on several issues, including that of the US-India relationship.

title: Kamala Harris Calls Trump To Congratulate Him On Election Win: Her Aide
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate him for winning the 2024 presidential election, one of her senior aides said, following a bitter and contentious race.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate him for winning the 2024 presidential election, one of her senior aides said, following a bitter and contentious race.

title: Kamala Harris Dials Trump To Concede Presidential Election, Say Her Aides
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate him for winning the 2024 presidential election, one of her senior aides said, following a bitter and contentious race.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris called Donald Trump on Wednesday to congratulate him for winning the 2024 presidential election, one of her senior aides said, following a bitter and contentious race.

title: Florida, 2 Other States Defy Trend And Vote Down Abortion Rights
content: Voters approved most of the referendums expanding the right to abortion in US states while Florida, Nebraska and South Dakota rejected such measures, giving anti-abortion advocates victories since the Supreme Court ended the constitutional right.
summary: Voters approved most of the referendums expanding the right to abortion in US states while Florida, Nebraska and South Dakota rejected such measures, giving anti-abortion advocates victories since the Supreme Court ended the constitutional right.

title: Who Is Kashyap 'Kash' Patel, Donald Trump's Likely Pick For CIA Chief
content: Donald Trump planned to name Kashyap Patel the deputy director of the CIA in the final weeks of his administration.
summary: Donald Trump planned to name Kashyap Patel the deputy director of the CIA in the final weeks of his administration.

title: Trump's Presidency Crushes Hopes Of First Female President, Again
content: The glass ceiling for women in politics just got even more daunting, as the prospect of a female US president has been shattered once again by Donald Trump.
summary: The glass ceiling for women in politics just got even more daunting, as the prospect of a female US president has been shattered once again by Donald Trump.

title: Elon Musk's Tesla's Shares Soar Over 15% After Donald Trump's Big Win
content: Donald Trump had said during his campaign that, if he won the White House, he would install Elon Musk at the head of a government efficiency commission to eliminate "trillions" of dollars in wasteful spending.
summary: Donald Trump had said during his campaign that, if he won the White House, he would install Elon Musk at the head of a government efficiency commission to eliminate "trillions" of dollars in wasteful spending.

title: Trump's Election Victory May Add To Trudeau's Challenges In Canada
content: Donald Trump's return to the White House next year could bring economic pain and difficult decisions for Canada's Liberal Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, once branded a "far-left lunatic" by the Republican.
summary: Donald Trump's return to the White House next year could bring economic pain and difficult decisions for Canada's Liberal Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, once branded a "far-left lunatic" by the Republican.

title: "We Expect Him To Be...": Why Many Israelis Welcome Another Trump Term?
content: Donald Trump's return to power in the United States will have a positive outcome on Israeli interests, several experts interviewed by AFP said on Wednesday.
summary: Donald Trump's return to power in the United States will have a positive outcome on Israeli interests, several experts interviewed by AFP said on Wednesday.

title: Saudi King, Crown Prince Congratulate Donald Trump On Election Win: Report
content: Saudi Arabia's King Salman and his son, de facto ruler Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory on Wednesday, state media reported.
summary: Saudi Arabia's King Salman and his son, de facto ruler Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory on Wednesday, state media reported.

title: "Immoral": Iran Minister Slams Woman Student's Public Act Of Stripping
content: Iran's science minister, Hossein Simaei, on Wednesday described a female student's public act of stripping down to her underwear as "immoral and uncustomary".
summary: Iran's science minister, Hossein Simaei, on Wednesday described a female student's public act of stripping down to her underwear as "immoral and uncustomary".

title: Chef Vikas Khanna's "Indian Cuisine" Reminder For "Mr President" Trump
content: Many congratulations are coming Donald Trump's way as he secured a historic comeback to the White House as the United States' 47th President. One such greeting came from celebrated Indian chef Vikas Khanna, along with a gentle reminder.
summary: Many congratulations are coming Donald Trump's way as he secured a historic comeback to the White House as the United States' 47th President. One such greeting came from celebrated Indian chef Vikas Khanna, along with a gentle reminder.

title: Trump's 'Day 1' Promise To Shut Clean Energy Projects Send Stocks Tumbling
content: Donald Trump's pledge to stop renewable energy projects on "day one" of his potential presidency has sent shockwaves through the industry, causing renewable energy shares to plummet.
summary: Donald Trump's pledge to stop renewable energy projects on "day one" of his potential presidency has sent shockwaves through the industry, causing renewable energy shares to plummet.

title: Explained: Why Kamala Harris's Historic White House Bid Fell Short
content: In a meeting with one of America's most powerful unions in September at its Washington headquarters, Vice President Kamala Harris said she'd protect union jobs and workers' livelihoods better than Donald Trump.
summary: In a meeting with one of America's most powerful unions in September at its Washington headquarters, Vice President Kamala Harris said she'd protect union jobs and workers' livelihoods better than Donald Trump.

title: Harris To Concede Defeat To Trump Early Tomorrow
content: Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris will deliver a speech conceding defeat in the US presidential election to Republican candidate Donald Trump, the White House said.
summary: Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris will deliver a speech conceding defeat in the US presidential election to Republican candidate Donald Trump, the White House said.

title: UK's Prince William Says Wife Kate Doing "Really Well" After Chemotherapy
content: Britain's Prince William said today that his wife Kate was doing "really well" and had been amazing in a year when she has undergone preventative chemotherapy for cancer.
summary: Britain's Prince William said today that his wife Kate was doing "really well" and had been amazing in a year when she has undergone preventative chemotherapy for cancer.
